=== How to recruit new LoCo contacts ===
* Discussed various methods of recruitment particularly for needed teams 
** State and Local LUGs
** Research state and local LUGs within states with needed teams
** Create a recruitment announcement to send out on state and local LUG mailing lists
** Attach the Ubuntu Weekly Newsletter with the recruitment announcement included on state and local LUG mailing lists 
** Ubuntu Forum header
** Create a recruitment announcement as a header within the Ubuntu Forums particularly in the Absolute Beginner Talk Forum
** Schools
** Demos and/or presentations at colleges, fairs and/or conventions
** Ubuntu Weekly Newsletter 
** Create a recruitment announcement to send out in the upcoming newsletter(s)
* Ubuntu.com, Canonical and/or Ubuntu Partners
** Research the possibilities of using Ubuntu resources to for recruitment
